channel.title: File sharing
channel.description: how the hell do you share files on sites like uppit and stuff its pissing me off??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 01:10:33 am[/size][hr]nvm i found it sorry kinda late and im frustrated but its all good now

item.title: File sharing
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Kaii Mod Kaii
item.description:
@Mod_Kaii wrote:

I had the same problem lol. I found out that all you have to do is right click on the folder you want to upload, and click compress, then it changes it into a .zip or .rar and then on uppit, megaupload or mediafire (whatever upload site) click on the .zip or .rar and it should upload as a folder then. If your own about uploading anything, the bar should be on the homepage.

Hope I Helped

Read full topic
